item.description:
update#2: Parag will be hosting this event, so if you guys have trouble finding the place or you have trouble with finding your meetup name on the guestlist, call his phone 9787617304


update#1: Guys we changed to time to meet from 10:00pm to 10:30pm


OK guy, we are sorry about canceling last saturdays meetup. However we did resolve some of the issues with 7 11 and we happy to say we can announce another meetup. The meetup will be this friday on December 21 at 7 1 1 at 10pm.

Remember this will be our first meetup ever, and we do plan on having meetups on a regular basis, so don't worry if you miss one.

So I would get there early around 10 so you have chance to mingle before it starts getting too crowded.

There is a 10 dollar cover charge for members of this meetup and their guests (otherwise 7 11 charges 15 dollars at the door).

So please rsvp 'yes' or 'maybe' so I can put you on the guestlist, and if your bringing guests, just message us through meetup.com

Again Parag is going to be hosting this event. I will have his direct contact info shortly incase you guys need to reach him there.

Parking:
you can find around newbury street, if your driving

T:
Green line to copley square

Guys this is gonna be a great event!, we hope to see you guys there, and yes we are going to another event for new years!

p.s. 7 1 1 does have good sushi there, so I hope its open at 10pm


highrollerbostongroup
item.name: BOSTON NIGHT LIFE GROUP FOR YOUNG PROFESSIONALS (21 - 35) December Meetup 1
